## Functions

### bitsRequired() {#a9f34de4e918fb49ca3edb81986f81dcf}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>int llvm::pointer&#95;union&#95;detail::bitsRequired (unsigned n)</>}
  labels = {["constexpr"]}>
Determine the number of bits required to store integers with values &lt; n.

This is ceil(log2(n)).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/pointerunion-h/#l00033">33</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/pointerunion-h">PointerUnion.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
